  • Method Details

    • waitForISOResponse

      public static <T extends ISOReportable> T waitForISOResponse(T originalReportable, long timeoutMillis) throws InterruptedException
      Waits until any messages for the given reportable have been acknowledged. Asserts if time out before getting any response
      Parameters:
      originalReportable - the reportable (claim/exposure) to watch
      timeoutMillis - the millisecond it waits for the response to come back
      Returns:
      the reportable, freshly reloaded after the last message was acknowledged
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted

    • waitForISOResponseOrTimeout

      public static <T extends ISOReportable> T waitForISOResponseOrTimeout(T originalReportable, long timeoutMillis) throws InterruptedException
      Waits until any messages for the given reportable have been acknowledged, or times out and returns null
      Parameters:
      originalReportable - the reportable (claim/exposure) to watch
      timeoutMillis - the millisecond it waits for the response to come back
      Returns:
      the reportable, freshly reloaded after the last message was acknowledged, or null if times out
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted

    • assertHasErrantMessage

      public static void assertHasErrantMessage(ISOReportable reportable, int blockedPending)
      Asserts that there is a message in the ERROR state for the given reportable, followed by the specified number of "pending send" messages which are blocked by the error.
      Parameters:
      reportable - the reportable to watch
      blockedPending - number of blocked pending messages waiting after the error

    • getMessagesForReportable

      public static Message[] getMessagesForReportable(ISOReportable reportable)
      Finds all the ISO messages in the database for the given reportable and returns them as an array, sorted by send order
      Parameters:
      reportable - the exposure with pending messages
      Returns:
      non null array of messages

      public static List<MessageHistory> getMessageHistoryForReportable(ISOReportable reportable)

      Parameters:
      reportable - the exposure/claim
      Returns:
      non null list of message history objects

      public static <T extends KeyableBean> T reload(T entity)

      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be reloaded
      Returns:
      readonly copy of the entity, containing the latest data

    • checkExposureValid

      public static String checkExposureValid(Exposure exposure)
      checks the validation level for both exposure and and claim associate to the exposure, then returns the error message if exposure is not valid.
      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure to check
      Returns:
      the error message if exposure is not valid. Returns null if valid

    • checkClaimValid

      public static String checkClaimValid(Claim claim)
      checks the validation level for the claim and all its exposures
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to check
      Returns:
      the error message if claim/exposures are not valid, or null if valid

    • resetMaxMessageId

      public static void resetMaxMessageId(long messageId) throws com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException
      Some ISO tests need to manipulate message ids. For example, ISORoundTripGosuLargeMessageIDTest tests that messageIds greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE can be handled. For such tests this method can be used to change the current maxkey value for cc_message to Integer.MAX_VALUE + 1. This test behavior is good for discovering places in the code which unknowingly assume ids are integers. Do not use this method except for tests that need to incorporate a long messageId as part of the request id. This method must be called early in the life cycle of the test, typically in the beforeClass method before any messages have been created.
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException

    • resetMaxMessageId

      public static void resetMaxMessageId() throws com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException
      Some ISO tests need to use small message ids, as they rely on being able to squeeze a test id into the high order bits of the message id within an ISORequestId. For such tests this method can be used to change the current maxkey value for cc_message to 0. This method must be called early in the lifecycle of the test, typically in the beforeClass method before any messages have been created.
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException

    • deleteAllMessages

      public static void deleteAllMessages() throws com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException
      Deletes all messages from the message table
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException

    • readISOConfiguration

      public static void readISOConfiguration() throws IOException, com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      For testing, some gosu tests need the ISO configuration to be read even if the iso destination is not enabled This sets up the ISO Translation tables and ISO properties variables.
      Throws:
      IOException
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
